SELECT M10.MEMO_ID MEMOID , M10.STUS_CODE_ID STUSID , S38.CODE STUSCODE , S38.NAME STUSNAME , M10.MEMO_TITLE MEMOTITLE , M10.MEMO_CNTNT MEMOCNTNT , M10.CRT_USER_ID CRTUSERID , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM SYS0047M WHERE USER_ID = M10.CRT_USER_ID) CRTUSERNM , TO_CHAR(M10.CRT_DT , 'DD/MM/YYYY') CRTDT , TO_CHAR(M10.CRT_DT , 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') FCRTDT , M10.UPD_USER_ID UPDUSERID , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM SYS0047M WHERE USER_ID = M10.UPD_USER_ID) UPDUSERNM , TO_CHAR(M10.UPD_DT , 'DD/MM/YYYY') UPDDT , TO_CHAR(M10.UPD_DT , 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') FUPDDT , M10.IS_STAFF_MEMO STAFFMEMO , M10.IS_CODY_MEMO CODYMEMO , M10.IS_HP_MEMO HPMEMO , M10.IS_HT_MEMO HTMEMO , M10.CRT_DEPT_ID , CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(M10.CRT_DT,'YYYYMMDD') < '20211101' THEN TO_CHAR(CALLCENTERUSER.FN_ERP_TAG_DEPT_NM('M',M10.CRT_DEPT_ID) ) ELSE FN_DEPT_CODE_TO_NM(M10.CRT_DEPT_ID) END as DEPARTMENT FROM MSC0010D M10 , SYS0038M S38 WHERE 1 = 1 AND M10.STUS_CODE_ID = S38.STUS_CODE_ID AND M10.STUS_CODE_ID = 1
AND UPPER(M10.MEMO_TITLE) like UPPER('%'||#{stitle}||'%')
AND M10.CRT_USER_ID like '%'|| #{screator} || '%'
AND M10.CRT_DEPT_ID = #{listDept}
AND M10.CRT_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{crtsdt}||'000000' , 'DD/MM/YYYYHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(#{crtedt}||'235959' , 'DD/MM/YYYYHH24MISS')
AND M10.IS_HP_MEMO = 1
AND M10.IS_CODY_MEMO = 1
AND M10.IS_HT_MEMO = 1
ORDER BY MEMO_ID DESC
